about_the_game:
No Such Luck tells the story of a young man who enters college after years of living on his own. He won the lottery, he got engaged - and then it all fell apart. Now ready to rejoin the world - reconnect with old friends, make new ones, all while trying to come to terms with the past. Of course college life comes with it's own set of challenges - sometimes, everything goes your way. Other times? No Such Luck.

No Such Luck contains a wide cast of characters. Your choices help shape the state of the world and the MC.

Current Contents:

Demo Version:

Full game also includes:

No Such Luck contains multiple easy to navigate freeroam events, a fully functional phone that updates with new apps and functionality throughout the course of the game, a dynamic biographies section to keep up to date with all characters, and more.

Episode one boasts over 10k total images, dozens of animations, and almost 200 uniquely scored music track - This demo build Contains the Prologue and CH1 - which is approximately 15% of the full game content at current time. (The Full game will be updated with new content as it is available!)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only and contains visual representations of sexual content in form of images and animations (vaginal, anal and oral sexual acts).

All sexual scenes are consensual, and all characters are over the age of 18 years old.

No Such Luck contains a few brief scene of violence and gore. While overall "bright" in tone, there are some darker themes and elements which appear as well as moments of violence and drug use.

detailed_description:
No Such Luck tells the story of a young man who enters college after years of living on his own. He won the lottery, he got engaged - and then it all fell apart. Now ready to rejoin the world - reconnect with old friends, make new ones, all while trying to come to terms with the past. Of course college life comes with it's own set of challenges - sometimes, everything goes your way. Other times? No Such Luck.

No Such Luck contains a wide cast of characters. Your choices help shape the state of the world and the MC.

Current Contents:

Demo Version:

Full game also includes:

No Such Luck contains multiple easy to navigate freeroam events, a fully functional phone that updates with new apps and functionality throughout the course of the game, a dynamic biographies section to keep up to date with all characters, and more.

Episode one boasts over 10k total images, dozens of animations, and almost 200 uniquely scored music track - This demo build Contains the Prologue and CH1 - which is approximately 15% of the full game content at current time. (The Full game will be updated with new content as it is available!)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: No Such Luck Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: As a young man, he left home immediately after high school, and has spent the last two years alone. He is finally ready to re-enter the world, ready to join his friends in college. Will it be drugs, sex and rock'n'roll? Or did he never truly get over what happened?
